posts.post_content: I have since upgraded.  Gorgeous card, one crease.  I'll be more than happy to send as many pics as you'd like.  It's the only card out of my 486 T206's that for some reason I kept slabbed, haha. Purchase with complete confidence; I've conducted numerous (flawless) transactions here.  $800 shipped and insured.  Thanks for looking!
$800 or best offer. Help me get my Magie!
Doesn't anybody need a green Cobb? Haha. Last price drop. $800 OBO.

Brenden,
  Could you send me a little more of a close up of the front please?


Don Miller             [url]rellim@abe.midco.net[/url]
Absolutely. I'll run it thru a scanner. Just give me a little time. In the poker room at the casino at the present time. Haha.
Friendly bump. $800 OBO. Thanks for looking. I would also consider partial trade for T206s that I still need.
